author: hollowstrawberry
description: Generate anime images with NovelAI v3.
install_msg:
ðŸ–¼ __**NovelAI**__
:warning: **This cog is capable of generating NSFW content. Be mindful.** ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load novelai
2. Enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog novelai
3. Sync slash commands with [p]slash sync
4. You may need to restart Discord to see the new commands.
5. Use /novelai to start generating images (the owner will be initially asked for a NovelAI username and password).
6. You should also install the imagescanner cog which lets you see image generation data.```
short: Generate anime images with NovelAI v3.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user preferences related to cog functionality.
